titleStmt.title: VVits priuate vvealth Stored with choise commodities to content the minde.
titleStmt.author: Breton, Nicholas, 1545?-1626?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Edw. Allde, for Iohn Tappe, and are to be solde at his shop at St. Magnus corner,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: his shop at St. Magnus corner
